title: Himari Sato
text:
is a Japanese <a href="tennis">tennis</a> player.
Sato has a career high <a href="Women%27s%20Tennis%20Association">WTA</a> singles ranking of 725 achieved on 3 February 2020. She also has a career high WTA doubles ranking of 745 achieved on 17 February 2020.
Sato represents <a href="Japan%20Fed%20Cup%20team">Japan</a> at the <a href="Billie%20Jean%20King%20Cup">Billie Jean King Cup</a>, where she made her debut at the <a href="2020%20Billie%20Jean%20King%20Cup%20Play-offs%23Ukraine%20vs.%20Japan">2021 play-offs</a> against <a href="Ukraine%20Fed%20Cup%20team">Ukraine</a>.
